docs.lead_paragraph: President Michelle Bachelet sent legislation to Congress on Saturday proposing to allow some abortions in Chile, a socially conservative South American nation that is among the few countries in the world that ban abortion in all circumstances.

headline.main: Chile's President Pushes to Ease Ban on All Abortions
headline.print_headline: Chile's President Pushes to Ease Ban on All Abortions

docs.snippet: President Michelle Bachelet sent legislation to Congress on Saturday proposing to allow some abortions in Chile, a socially conservative South American nation that is among the few countries in the world that ban abortion in all circumstances.

docs.lead_paragraph: Chile's president, Michelle Bachelet, unveiled plans on Saturday to ease a complete ban on abortions in the socially conservative South American country.

headline.main: Chile's Bachelet Takes on Conservatives With Plan to Ease Abortion Ban
headline.print_headline: Chile's Bachelet Takes on Conservatives With Plan to Ease Abortion Ban

docs.snippet: Chile's president, Michelle Bachelet, unveiled plans on Saturday to ease a complete ban on abortions in the socially conservative South American country.

docs.lead_paragraph: My ever-pregnant mother, a devout Catholic, agonized over what to do. If only Pope Francis had been around then.
docs.snippet: My ever-pregnant mother, a devout Catholic, agonized over what to do. If only Pope Francis had been around then.
